description.personaManagement: Choose an AI persona that matches your coding style and preferences.
description.rulesDescription: Rules allow you to provide system-level guidance. Think of them as a persistent way to include context and preferences for your projects or globally for every conversation.
description.workflowsDescription: Workflows allow you to define a series of steps for Caret to perform repetitive tasks like deploying services or submitting PRs. To run a workflow, type /workflow-name in the chat.

tooltip.chatbot: In Chatbot mode, Caret provides expert consultation and analysis
tooltip.agent: In Agent mode, Caret collaborates to implement solutions
tooltip.plan: In Plan mode, formulate strategies and plans
tooltip.act: In Act mode, execute and implement plans

openAIReasoningEffort.label: OpenAI Reasoning Effort
openAIReasoningEffort.description: Adjust the reasoning effort for OpenAI models. Higher effort may lead to more detailed responses but can be slower and more costly.

uiLanguage.label: UI Language
uiLanguage.description: Select the display language for the Caret UI.

preferredLanguage.label: AI Response Language
preferredLanguage.description: The language that Caret should use for communication.

modeSystem.label: Mode Settings
modeSystem.description: Enable Caret mode settings to use Caret's Plan/Act modes.

separateModels.label: Use different models for Chatbot and Agent modes
separateModels.description: Switching between Chatbot and Agent mode will persist the API and model used in the previous mode. This may be helpful e.g. when using a strong reasoning model for expert consultation (Chatbot) and a cheaper coding model for collaborative development (Agent).

apiKey.label: {{providerName}} API Key
apiKey.helpText: This key is stored locally and only used to make API requests from this extension.

claudeSonnet4.description: Recommended for agentic coding in Cline
claudeSonnet4.label: Best

gpt5.description: State of the art model for complex, long-horizon tasks
gpt5.label: New

info.fullText: The extension automatically fetches the latest list of models available on <0>OpenRouter.</0> If you're unsure which model to choose, Cline works best with <1>anthropic/claude-sonnet-4.</1> You can also try searching "free" for no-cost options currently available.
The extension automatically fetches the latest list of models available on <0>Requesty.</0> If you're unsure which model to choose, Cline works best with <1>anthropic/claude-3-7-sonnet-latest.</1>

vertex.setupLink1: 1) create a Google Cloud account â€º enable the Vertex AI API â€º enable the desired Claude models,
vertex.setupLink2: 2) install the Google Cloud CLI â€º configure Application Default Credentials.

vsCodeLm.getStartedDescription: The VS Code Language Model API allows you to run models provided by other VS Code extensions (including but not limited to GitHub Copilot). The easiest way to get started is to install the Copilot extension from the VS Marketplace and enabling Claude 4 Sonnet.
vsCodeLm.experimentalNote: Note: This is a very experimental integration and may not work as expected.

terminalOutputLineLimit.label: Terminal output limit
terminalOutputLineLimit.description: Maximum number of lines to include in terminal output when executing commands. When exceeded, lines will be removed from the middle, saving tokens.

thinkingBudget.description: Higher budgets may allow you to achieve more comprehensive and nuanced reasoning

useCustomPrompt.label: Use compact prompt
useCustomPrompt.description: A system prompt optimized for smaller context window (e.g. 8k or less).
useCustomPrompt.warning: Does not support Mcp and Focus Chain

settings.signUpDescription: Sign up for an account to get access to the latest models, billing dashboard to view usage and credits, and more upcoming features.
settings.byContining: By continuing, you agree to the
settings.payAsYouGoDescription: * Additional charges apply after all subscription usage is exhausted.
settings.title: Account

chat.commandApprovalRequired: This command requires your approval to run.

tool.wantsToListFilesRecursive: Wants to list all files in this directory
tool.listedFilesRecursive: Listed all files in this directory

tool.listedCodeDefinitionNames: Listed source code definition names in this directory

checkmarkControl.restoreFilesDescription: Restores only the file changes from this checkpoint.
checkmarkControl.restoreTaskOnlyDescription: Restores only the task from this checkpoint.
checkmarkControl.restoreFilesAndTaskDescription: Restores both file changes and the task from this checkpoint.

modelInfo.freeRequestsPerMinute: * Free up to {{count}} requests per minute. After that, billing depends on prompt size.
modelInfo.forMoreInfo: For more info, see pricing details.

caret.name: Caret
caret.description: Caret supports various LLMs. You can subscribe to Caret service for free access, use ChatGPT, Claude, Gemma APIs, or configure local LLMs.
caret.login: Login & Sign Up with Caret Account
caret.apiKeyConfigured: API key is configured. Login is not required.
caret.feature2: Billing dashboard to view usage and credits

vsCodeLm.description: Use models provided by other VS Code extensions (e.g., GitHub Copilot).

sapAiCore.description: Use models deployed on SAP AI Core.
sapAiCore.pricingNote: Pricing is calculated using SAP's Capacity Units rather than direct USD pricing.

cerebras.sotaDescription: SOTA coding model with ~2000 tokens/s ($0 free tier)
cerebras.noSubscription: â€¢ Use this if you don't have a Cerebras subscription
cerebras.rateLimits: â€¢ Rate limits: 150K TPM, 1M TPH/TPD, 10 RPM, 100 RPH/RPD

vercelAiGateway.description: Use models through the Vercel AI Gateway.

baseten.apiKeyHelp: This key is stored locally and only used to make API requests from this extension. You can get a {{providerName}} API key by signing up here.

requesty.claudeDescription: Anthropic's most intelligent model. Highest level of intelligence and capability.

fireworks.kimiK2Description: Kimi K2 is a state-of-the-art mixture-of-experts (MoE) language model with 32 billion activated parameters and 1 trillion total parameters. Trained with the Muon optimizer, Kimi K2 achieves exceptional performance across frontier knowledge, reasoning, and coding tasks while being meticulously optimized for agentic capabilities.

qwenCode.description: Qwen3 Coder Plus - High-performance coding model with 1M context window for large codebases

dify.workflowDescription: Dify workflow - model selection is configured in your Dify application

nebius.apiKeyHelpText: You can get a {{providerName}} API key by signing up here.

caretProvider.futureProviders: ChatGPT and Claude will be supported in the future

apiOptions.openRouterRecommended: OpenRouter is recommended for high rate limits and variety of models.
apiOptions.thisKeyStoredLocally: This key is stored locally and only used to make API requests from this extension.
apiOptions.getApiKeySignUp: You can get an API key by signing up here.
apiOptions.getAnthropicApiKey: You can get an Anthropic API key by signing up here.
apiOptions.getOpenAiApiKey: You can get an OpenAI API key by signing up here.
apiOptions.getGeminiApiKey: You can get a Gemini API key by signing up here.
apiOptions.providerComingSoon: {{provider}} support will be added in future updates.

systemMessages.wantsToViewTopLevelFiles: Caret wants to view the top level files in this directory:

telemetry.description: Caret collects anonymous error and usage data to help us fix bugs and improve the extension. No code, prompts, or personal information is ever sent.
telemetry.settingsLink: You can turn this setting off in settings.

mcp.title: MCP Servers
mcp.noServersFound: No MCP servers found in marketplace
mcp.description: The Model Context Protocol enables communication with locally running MCP servers that provide additional tools and resources to extend Caret's capabilities.

freeStealth.title: Free Stealth Model
freeStealth.description: Advanced stealth model with 262K context window designed for complex coding tasks. Available in the Caret provider for free.

focusChain.title: Focus Chain
focusChain.description: Keeps Caret focused on long-horizon tasks with automatic todo list management, breaking down complex tasks into manageable steps with real-time progress tracking and passive reminders.

autoCompact.title: Auto Compact
autoCompact.description: Auto summarizes your task and next steps when your conversation approaches the model's context window limit. This significantly helps Caret stay on track for long task sessions!

deepPlanning.title: Deep Planning
deepPlanning.description: New /deep-planning slash command transforms Caret into an architect who investigates your codebase, asks clarifying questions, and creates a comprehensive plan before writing any code.

claude1M.title: 1M Context for Claude Sonnet 4
claude1M.description: Caret/OpenRouter users get instant access, Anthropic users need Tier 4, and Bedrock users must be on a supported region.

optimizedClaude4.title: Optimized for Claude 4
optimizedClaude4.description: Caret is now optimized to work with the Claude 4 family of models, resulting in improved performance, reliability, and new capabilities.

workflows.title: Workflows
workflows.description: Create and manage workflow files that can be injected into conversations via slash commands, making it easy to automate repetitive tasks.
